### Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) Notice: Institutional Appliances

#### Notice Type and Method

This Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) is a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO), a concurrent, open bidding procurement process. The standing offers will be established for the supply of institutional appliances to the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) under its control.

#### Procurement Description

The CSC requires the supply of standardized appliances and pricing on washers, dryers, refrigerators, freezers, ranges, and microwaves on an as-needed basis for federal institutions under its control. Up to two Regional Individual Standing Offers (RISOs) will be issued per zone: one PSIB stream and one non-PSIB stream. In the event of two standing offers being issued for one zone, the PSIB Standing Offer holder will have First Right of Refusal for issuance of call-ups.

#### Key Requirements

*   Offerors must certify that they qualify as an Indigenous business under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) and that they will comply with all requirements of PSIB.
*   Suppliers must provide firm unit pricing for two years for all items listed in the Basis of Payment to be considered for the issuance of a Standing Offer for this requirement.

#### Procurement Schedule

*   Amendment closing time has been updated: please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by April 19th, 2024, at 14:00 EDT.
*   Any bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will be declared non-responsive.

#### Contact Information

Nimuan, Kat (SPAC/PSPC), Kat.Nimuan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca, is the primary contact for this procurement.
